# `.opf`

They referenced by the OPS scene file.

These files is in OPF or GWA format, see AmapStudio documentation ([OPF
format](http://amapstudio.cirad.fr/soft/xplo/private/opf_format), [GWA
format](http://amapstudio.cirad.fr/soft/xplo/private/the_gwa_format_-_geometry_with_attributes)).
To sumerise, it is an XML format describing vertices, faces, normals,
texture coordiantes, materials (colors), attributes and tranformation
matrices.
